test_cases.text: The sky is blue. The sky is not blue.
All birds can fly. Penguins are birds. Penguins cannot fly.
All mammals are warm-blooded. Dogs are mammals. Dogs are warm-blooded.
If it rains, the ground will be wet. It is raining. The ground is dry.
All humans are mortal. Socrates is human. Socrates is immortal.
All cats are animals. All dogs are animals. Therefore, all cats are dogs.
